data.title: John Tavares
data.meta_description: John Tavares - National Hockey League (NHL) current player. His career, bio & stats are here at HockeyPedia.
data.text:
John Tavares (born September 20, 1990) is a Canadian professional ice hockey centre and captain of the Toronto Maple Leafs of the National Hockey League (NHL). He was selected first overall by the New York Islanders in the 2009 NHL Entry Draft, where he spent nine seasons and served as captain for five seasons.

John Tavares Statistics

Achievements

NHL All-Rookie Team 2010

6x NHL All-Star 2012, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019

First NHL All-Star Team 2015

U17 WHC All-Star Team 2006

IIHF World U20 Championship gold medal 2008, 2009

U20 WJC All-Star Team 2009

U20 WJC Best Forward 2009

U20 WJC Most Valuable Player 2009

Spengler Cup champion 2012

Olympic Gold 2014

World Cup of Hockey 2016
